text: Four months ago, Cheryl Burke announced that her father, Stephen Louis Burke, sadly passed away. But now, things are looking up for the Dancing with the Stars alum. Yesterday, Burke posted a selfie on Instagram and revealed that something positive came out of this dark time. She explained that her dad ’ s passing led her to discover that her two sisters, Mandy and Nicole, aren ’ t her only siblings. She also has a half sister, Ina.
